title: With reference to your application No
clause_text: With reference to your application No. dated for the grant of sanction for the development work / the erection of a building / execution of work on Plot No. …… Revenue S.No. ……. / Gat No. ........ / Khasara No. ....... / City Survey No. ……../ Final Plot No. ........ Mauje , I regret to inform you that the proposal has been refused under Section 18 / 45 / 69 of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966, on the following grounds.
